docs.text: Welcome to yams yams is a Go library, server, and CLI providing foundational capabilities to simulate access for AWS IAM policies. It was designed for security, simplicity, and speed to meet the needs of cloud security teams working in large environments.
docs.title: About

docs.text: yams is a Go library, server, and CLI providing foundational capabilities to simulate access for AWS IAM policies. It was designed for security, simplicity, and speed to meet the needs of cloud security teams working in large environments.
docs.title: Welcome to yams

docs.text: Getting Started This page will help you get up and running with yams Installation yams can be installed via: $ go install github.com/nsiow/yams@latest Alternatively, you can clone the repo at https://github.com/nsiow/yams.git and run: $ make && make install
docs.title: Getting Started
